attributes.action:
Government to purchase utilities,
Gas and Electric
attributes.additional_details:
Purchase of utilities to enable UK citizens to reasonably afford gas and electricity. 
To create  non profit organisations that all will benefit from, reduction of living and working costs.
No action NOW will result in severe unaffordable debt, ill heath, poor mental health, 
stress, inability to heat homes and ultimately people will die as a result.
attributes.background: Compulsory purchase of utilities namely gas and electric.
